definition: mussels/bivalves grown in rivers and lakes
abbr. for Bengbu prefecture-level city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui

sentences.english: The clam immediately closed his shells and tightly clamped the snipe's beak.
sentences.chinese: 河蚌爲了保命，趕緊將硬殼合上，緊緊夾住了鷸的嘴。

sentences.english: So he went to use a net to get it.
sentences.chinese: 他就用一個網抓到了河蚌。

sentences.english: Salmon, clams, mussels , shrimp, tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 三文魚，蛤蜊，河蚌，蝦，番茄醬。

sentences.english: A clam opened his two shells, basking in the beach.
sentences.chinese: 一隻河蚌就張開兩片硬殼，在河灘上舒服地曬太陽。

sentences.english: A snipe saw the clam and wanted to enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 一隻鷸鳥看見河蚌，就想美餐一頓。

sentences.english: But a man saw the shell.
sentences.chinese: 一個人看見了這個河蚌。

sentences.english: Suddenly, it saw the clam lying there with its shell open.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，它看見河灘上那隻張着口的大河蚌。

sentences.english: The shell used the little sand to make a pearl.
sentences.chinese: 河蚌把這顆沙粒變成了一粒珍珠。

sentences.english: Scientists Create Glue Inspired by Mussels.
sentences.chinese: 科學家由河蚌受啓發發明新膠體。

sentences.english: Neither snipe nor clam would yield, and they remained in that position for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 鷸鳥和河蚌互不相讓，死死地糾纏在一起。

definition: Asian swamp eel (Monopterus albus)/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
abbr. for Bengbu prefecture-level city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui
variant of 黃鱔|黄鳝[huang2 shan4]
